title: Inquiry and Collaborative Learning Design Based on Ubiquitous Computing

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and general understanding of social sciences
context.additional_context: Social competency enhancement training for working professionals using ubiquitous technology.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement inquiry-based learning scenarios using ubiquitous computing tools.
Learners can propose solutions to social issues through collaborative knowledge-building activities based on smartphones.
Learners can evaluate self-directed learning strategies in ubiquitous environments and derive improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
